snippet.title: The Lone Blade - [OLD] Demo Gameplay
snippet.description:
https://opia-games.itch.io/the-lone-blade

The Lone Blade is a 3D platformer where you play as a sword, make your way throughout the ruins of a world that once was yours, trapped in a blade.

The Free Demo is available on itch.io 

https://opia-games.itch.io/the-lone-blade
